features.description: Comprehensive form creation and management system for custom forms and information collection
capabilities: Collect information from clients and staff members
Create client forms (intake forms, consent forms, waivers)
Create staff member forms (SOAP notes, charting, treatment summaries)
Create external forms for public sharing

features.description: Tool for building and customizing form templates with various field types and settings
capabilities: Build form templates with Details, Form Fields, Preview, and Advanced tabs
Specify who fills out forms (clients, staff, external users)
Assign forms to specific appointments or services
Enable/disable field connections to client profiles

features.description: Visual annotation tool for marking up client photos and image templates on forms
capabilities: Draw on images to emphasize specific areas
Add shapes like arrows or rectangles
Write notes and comments on images
Use pre-built face and body chart templates
Support for multiple images per form

features.description: System for viewing, tracking, and managing completed form submissions
capabilities: View form submissions from multiple locations (Forms app, appointment details, client timeline)

features.description: Review and approval system for forms requiring professional sign-off
capabilities: Set forms to require review and approval
Assign specific staff members as approvers
Support review-only or review with signature requirements

features.description: Capability to save partial form completion and resume later
capabilities: Save progress on partially completed forms
Multiple staff member collaboration on same form

features.description: Public forms that can be shared via links for external use
capabilities: Create forms accessible via public links
No login required for form completion

features.description: Various input field types for comprehensive data collection
capabilities: Email and phone number fields with client profile sync

features.description: Third-party integration for advanced waiver creation and management
capabilities: Automatic PDF storage in client timelines

features.description: Access to pre-built form templates and examples for various business types
capabilities: Salon and spa intake form templates

steps: Create form template for specific services
Enable automatic form assignment to appointments
Client receives notification with form link
Client completes form (including image markup if needed)
Form submission automatically syncs to client profile
Staff can view completed forms in multiple locations
Create staff member form template (SOAP notes, treatment summary)
Staff member begins form during appointment
Save progress and continue later if needed
Complete form with image markup and notes
Submit for approval if required
Approved form stored in client timeline
Create consent form with approval requirement
Assign medical director as approver
Client completes consent form with image markup
Form requires medical director review and signature
Medical director approves with digital signature
Approved form stored as compliance documentation
Create account in WaiverForever
Generate API key in WaiverForever
Configure integration in Mangomint
Create waiver templates in WaiverForever
Enable auto-processing and approval
Connect specific templates for automatic sync

integrations.name: WaiverForever
integrations.purpose: Advanced waiver creation and liability management with automatic PDF storage in client timelines

integrations.name: Forms & Charting Add-on
integrations.purpose: Subscription add-on required to access full Forms app functionality

integrations.name: Client Profile System
integrations.purpose: Automatic synchronization of form data with client profiles for seamless information management

integrations.name: Appointment System
integrations.purpose: Automatic form assignment based on appointment services and integration with appointment details

competitive_advantages: Comprehensive image markup capabilities with pre-built body and face chart templates
Advanced approval workflows with digital signature support for medical spa compliance
Progress saving functionality allowing collaborative form completion
Multiple form access points (Forms app, appointment details, client timeline)
External forms capability for website integration and lead generation
Automatic client profile synchronization with form submissions
Industry-specific form templates for salons, spas, med spas, and tattoo shops
Flexible form assignment based on specific services or appointment types
Built-in form duplication and template management
Permission-based access control for form management and viewing
